directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Prepare brownie mix according to package directions.  Pour half of batter in a 9x13 inch baking dish.  Top with a layer of chocolate bars.  Cover with caramels.  Pour remaining batter over all.
Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes, until set.  Let cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package individually wrapped caramels, unwrapped
title: Death by Chocolate and Caramel
